## stargazer

```{r fig.width = 5, fig.height = 5}
fit1<-lm(mpg ~ cyl *drat, mtcars)
summary(fit1)

```

```{r fig.cap = "scatterplot: cars", fig.width = 1, fig.height = 1}
ggplot2:: ggplot(mtcars,aes(x=drat,y=mpg,color=cyl))+ geom_point(aes(color=cyl))+labs()

```

## 유튜브 가능
```{r echo=FALSE }
blogdown::shortcode('youtube', 'vcVsjUh0ESk')
```


## 인스타그램 가능
```{r }
blogdown::shortcode('instagram','CBpbpW_HHnq')
```
